thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: SHANE
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by SHANE

author: SHANE
title: SHANE
text:
Was told the car was top of the range when It was the base model, got a baby seat which didn't have the shoulder strap cushion which irritated my son and left marks in his neck and shoulders.
When I returned it I was told the baby seat was missing them because other people take them off which is a poor excuse especially when it hurts an infant, they didn't care at all
